citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:15 -
11:45am on 02/09/2016.
Inspector arrived at facility, knocked on residence door, honked GOV horn, and called listed phone number with no
response.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:15 -
11:45am on 02/09/2016.
Inspector arrived at facility, knocked on residence door, honked GOV horn, and called listed phone number with no
response.
